allowed_languages.desc: List of supported languages of Writing Aids (spell checker, grammar checker, thesaurus, hyphenation) on this instance. Allowing too many has negative effect on startup performance.
allowed_languages.default: de_DE en_GB en_US es_ES fr_FR it nl pt_BR pt_PT ru

config.allowed_languages: de_DE en_GB en_US es_ES fr_FR it nl pt_BR pt_PT ru

sys_template_path.desc: Path to a template tree with shared libraries etc to be used as source for chroot jails for child processes.

child_root_path.desc: Path to the directory under which the chroot jails for the child processes will be created. Should be on the same file system as sys_template_path. Must be an empty directory.

server_name.desc: External hostname:port of the server running coolwsd. If empty, it's derived from the request (please set it if this doesn't work). May be specified when behind a reverse-proxy or when the hostname is not reachable directly.

file_server_root_path.desc: Path to the directory that should be considered root for the file server. This should be the directory containing cool.

memproportion.desc: The maximum percentage of system memory consumed by all of the Collabora Online Development Edition, after which we start cleaning up idle documents

num_prespawn_children.desc: Number of child processes to keep started in advance and waiting for new clients.

per_document.desc: Per-document settings, including LO Core settings.

max_concurrency.desc: The maximum number of threads to use while processing a document.

idle_timeout_secs.desc: The maximum number of seconds before unloading an idle document. Defaults to 1 hour.

idlesave_duration_secs.desc: The number of idle seconds after which document, if modified, should be saved. Disabled when 0. Defaults to 30 seconds.

autosave_duration_secs.desc: The number of seconds after which document, if modified, should be saved. Disabled when 0. Defaults to 5 minutes.

limit_load_secs.desc: Maximum number of seconds to wait for a document load to succeed. 0 for unlimited.

limit_convert_secs.desc: Maximum number of seconds to wait for a document conversion to succeed. 0 for unlimited.

out_of_focus_timeout_secs.desc: The maximum number of seconds before dimming and stopping updates when the browser tab is no longer in focus. Defaults to 120 seconds.

idle_timeout_secs.desc: The maximum number of seconds before dimming and stopping updates when the user is no longer active (even if the browser is in focus). Defaults to 15 minutes.

loleaflet_html.desc: Allows UI customization by replacing the single endpoint of coolwsd

level.desc: Can be 0-8, or none (turns off logging), fatal, critical, error, warning, notice, information, debug, trace

property.name: rotation
property.desc: Log file rotation strategy. See Poco FileChannel.

property.name: archive
property.desc: Append either (age) or (size) of unit to the archived log filename to avoid conflicts.

property.name: purgeAge
property.desc: The maximum age of log files to preserve. See Poco FileChannel.

property.name: purgeCount
property.desc: The maximum number of log files to preserve. Use 'none' to disable purging. See Poco FileChannel.

property.name: rotateOnOpen
property.desc: Enable/disable log file rotation on opening.

property.name: flush
property.desc: Enable/disable flushing after logging each line. May harm performance. Note that without flushing after each line, the log lines from the different processes will not appear in chronological order.

anonymize_user_data.desc: Enable to anonymize/obfuscate of user-data in logs. If default is true, then log anonymization is enabled. Useful for debugging anonymized logs.

trace.desc: Dump commands and notifications for replay. When 'snapshot' is true, the source file is copied to the path first.

path.desc: Output file path, use '%' for timestamp, '%d' for pid

message.desc: Regex pattern of messages to exclude

path.desc: Path to copy the source file to

proto.desc: Protocol to use IPv4, IPv6 or all for both

listen.desc: Listen address that coolwsd binds to. Can be 'any' or 'loopback'.

service_root.desc: Prefix all the pages, websockets, etc. with this path.

frame_ancestors.desc: Specify who is allowed to embed the Collabora Online iframe (coolwsd and WOPI host are always allowed). Separate multiple hosts by space.

connection_timeout_secs.desc: Specifies the connection, send, recv timeout in seconds for connections initiated by coolwsd (such as WOPI connections).

termination.desc: Connection via proxy where coolwsd acts as working via https, but actually uses http.

enable.desc: Controls whether the welcome screen should be shown to the users on new install and updates.

enable_button.desc: Controls whether the welcome screen should have an explanatory button instead of an X button to close the dialog.

path.desc: Path to 'welcome-$lang.html' files served on first start or when the version changes

host.desc: Regex pattern of hostname to allow or deny.
Regex pattern of hostname to allow or deny.
Regex pattern of hostname to allow or deny.

max_file_size.desc: Maximum document size in bytes to load. 0 for unlimited.

refresh.desc: How frequently we should re-acquire a lock with the storage server, in seconds (default 15 mins) or 0 for no refresh

alias_groups.desc: default mode is 'first' it allows only the first host when groups are not defined. set mode to 'groups' and define group to allow multiple host and its aliases

tile_cache_path.desc: Path to a directory where to keep the tile cache

monitors.desc: Addresses of servers we connect to on start for monitoring

quarantine_files.desc: Files are stored here to be examined later in cases of crashes or similar situation.

path.desc: Path to directory under which quarantined files will be stored

max_size_mb.desc: Maximum allowed quarantine size in MB

remote_url.desc: remote server to which you will send resquest to get remote config in response.
